Keywords: Skrulls , Spy , Warrior , X-Men
Real Name: Rl'nnd
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Ally
ENGINEERED TO REPLACE THE X-MEN: SIDELINE ACTIVE, UNIQUE MODIFIER: Friendly Captains and Sidekicks modify attack +1 when attacking one or more characters with the X-Men keyword.
POWERS OF THE X-MEN: FREE: Choose 2 powers from the following list. Rl'nnd can use those powers until you choose again: Phasing/Teleport, Running Shot, Charge, Blades/Claws/Fangs, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Energy Explosion, Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses, Regeneration.

Comments
December 23, 2021
Disasstah
Solid pick a power piece that might find it's way onto teams capable of swapping out sideboards. A must play in sealed. Having a natural 4-6 Shape Change and the option to pick Super Senses makes this piece difficult to hit right out the gate. Will most likely get broken soon and hated right after that.
November 8, 2021
fastcat99
I think I like this guy! I miss the Super Skrulls, glad they're back!
October 28, 2021
Goop
Not as good as the Super Skrull from F4 set but still pretty decent. You can play defensive when you need to with ESD and SS and then switch to whatever offense is going to suit you best.
